description:
People Playground is a physics-based simulation game where you can spawn humanoid figures and experiment with tools, weapons and other objects. With tools like gravity guns and dismemberment, players are free to experiment and create their own stories and scenarios within the simple yet flexible sandbox.

The gameplay is centered around simulation and experimentation, allowing players to discover how different objects interact based on physics principles. People Playground has a tranquil atmosphere but also contains large amounts of blood, gore and dismemberment, so it is suited to an adult audience.

Main Features: • Ragdoll physics - The movement and behavior of characters and objects are based on realistic physics simulations. • Tools and weapons - Includes items like gravity guns, saws, guns, explosives and more. • Parts system - Characters can be dismembered into individual body parts. • Environment customization - Terrain, obstacles and backgrounds can be modified. • Scenario creation - Save your creations and experiments as scenarios to load later. • Mod support - Community made mods expand the possibilities further.

Getting Started: • Tap R to respawn characters instantly. • Hold F to grab objects and characters. • Tap E to enable/disable god mode (invincibility) for the selected character. • Drag body parts to connect them. • Add force to parts using the right click menu. • Select multiple parts using shift + left click. • Unlock tools in the settings menu.

Tips and Tricks: • Experiment! Try combining tools and weapons to see what interesting things emerge from the physics interactions. • Save scenarios frequently by pressing Ctrl + S. • Start simple and work your way up to more complex experiments. • Watch tutorial and guide videos made by the community for more advanced tips. • Install mods to unlock extra items, vehicles, characters and more.
